entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

urls.title: Trump removes internal watchdog tasked with overseeing coronavirus relief funds
urls.description: Glenn Fine is being replaced as acting Pentagon inspector general, thereby removing him from the committee overseeing $2.2 trillion in spending.

text:
@GOP 100,000+ Americans have died of COVID19.

36 million of us have lost our jobs.

The Republican Swamp’s looting machine is working overtime!!

https://t.co/WuinHoiM5f
